verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:11
verses.text: And the Lord said to Samuel, Behold, I will do a thing in Israel, at which both the ears of every one that heareth it shall tingle.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:12
verses.text: In that day I will perform against Eli all things which I have spoken concerning his house: when I begin, I will also make an end.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:13
verses.text: For I have told him that I will judge his house for ever for the iniquity which he knoweth; because his sons made themselves vile, and he restrained them not.
